data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Paris, Île-de-France, France humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Paris, Île-de-France, France
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 27,745 believers in the county of Paris to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 81 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 1,380,812 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.
God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 27,745 believers in Paris, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Lord, please give the 27,745 believers in the county of Paris the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the county of Paris.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.section_summary:
the county of Paris, Île-de-France, France has a population of 2,258,000.

We estimate Paris has 27,745 people who might know Jesus, 1,380,812 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 849,443 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 2,230,255 lost in Paris that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light
